member.name: M:Bam.Net.Configuration.DefaultConfiguration.InvokeConfigMethods(System.Object)
member.summary: Invokes methods declared in the appSettings section of the default configuration file.
member.param: The object instance to invoke methods on
member.remarks: The keys should be in the format <Type.Name>.InvokeMethod.<MethodName>.<Order as int>. For example: PatternsDatabaseSetupPermissionsInfo.InvokeMethod.AddStandardDbOwnerGroup.0. The trailing number determines the order of invocation relative to all other method invocations from configuration. The values should be a comma separated list of string parameters to be passed to the method upon invocation. Any additional spaces in the comma separated list of values will not be trimmed so the invoked methods should handle that possibility accordingly.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Configuration.DefaultConfiguration.InvokeConfigMethods(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Invokes methods declared in the specified appSettingDictionary.
member.param: The object instance to invoke methods on
A dictionary of methods to invoke along with the parameter values.
member.remarks: The dictionary keys should be in the format <Type.Name>.InvokeMethod.<MethodName>.<Order as int>. For example: PatternsDatabaseSetupPermissionsInfo.InvokeMethod.AddStandardDbOwnerGroup.0. The trailing number determines the order of invocation relative to all other method invocations from configuration. The values should be a comma separated list of string parameters to be passed to the method upon invocation. Any additional spaces in the comma separated list of values will not be trimmed so the invoked methods should handle that possibility accordingly.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.ServiceExe.ProcessCommandLineArgs(System.String[])
member.summary:
Returns true if there were recognized command line arguments to be processed otherwise false. Not to be confused with the command line arguments intended for CommandLineInterface implementations. This method will process service related comand line arguments. A call to SetInfo should be made prior to this call to ensure all ServiceInfo is already set.
Valid values are:
-i [-ck:{credentialKey}] Install the current ServiceExe implementation as a service. Using the specified appSettings key to look for credentials in the config file. Expected keys would be key="{credentialKey}" and key="{credentialKey}Password". Values will be retrieved using DefaultConfiguration
-i [true] Install the current ServiceExe implementation as a service allowing desktop interaction. Cannot be combined with -ck option.
-s Start the service
-k Kill (stop) the service
-r Restart the service (stop and start)
-u Uninstall the service
-dl [-f] Delete the log. Specify -f to force deletion without prompting to confirm
